hackathon-description-text: To empower young engineers and entrepreneurs in Hong Kong,

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Technical Evangelist in the Developer Experience Group, Microsoft Hong Kong

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 72號創新中心1樓, Fa Po Street香港設計中心圖書館

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does the project make effective and appropriate use of the major features of its chosen platform(s)? Does the project include innovations in technical design and/or implementation?
Does the project create a new category of product or service? Does the project clearly and meaningfully innovate beyond existing products or services?

Does the project have a clear target market or audience? Does the project address a clear need, problem, or opportunity and is the solution clearly explained? Is the project’s purpose and basic functionality easily understood?
Does the team have a credible plan for getting their project to market in terms of business model, any required partnerships, or other factors?

This is a 24-hour event which may requires your team to stay in the venue overnight. Does your team can keep working to solve technical problems overnight? Your overnight hack spirit will also be evaluated!

hackathon-location-address: Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 72號創新中心1樓, Fa Po Street香港設計中心圖書館
hackathon-description-header: Bring your imaginations to the cloud #Xamarin #VSCode #Azure
